acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was deposited by Clifton Waller Barrett on February 11, 1965, and changed to gifts on July 1, 1991.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of 9 items, chiefly correspondence of William James.

did.unittitle: William James to Frank P. Stearns 1897 Feb 20;

scopecontent.p: Promises visit to Boston, comments on Child Memorial and on [Francis James] Child himself.
Convinced of fact of "supernormal cognition," but cannot yet explain it, refers to his The Will to Believe.

did.unittitle: William James to William M. Payne 1899 Mar 15;

scopecontent.p: Will consider Otto Kyllmann's invitation if appointment to the Sorbonne comes through, expects to continue relations with Longmans publishing house.

did.unittitle: William James to [Mark Anthony de Wolfe] Howe 1906 May 11;

scopecontent.p: Has written and mailed the letter requested by Howe, asks for proofs of article on earthquake for his wife's use.

did.unittitle: William James to J. Gidley Robinson 1909 Mar 19;

scopecontent.p: Declines to send article on manual training for the P. S. Review.

did.unittitle: William James to Philosophy 2 Class n.d.;

scopecontent.p: Lists references on subject of attention, will bring German pamphlets, suggest other places to get information on the subject, w/engraving of William James.

did.unittitle: William James to Charles [Eliot Norton] n.d.;

scopecontent.p: Emphasizes that he cannot accept invitation.
